name: Balu
profile: An enthusiast for long walks and hearty treats, dedicated to spreading joy and relaxation. With several years of experience in tail-wagging and ball-chasing, I understand how to bring comfort and happiness to the surroundings.

experience.title: Junior FeelGood Manager
experience.description:
Responsible for welcoming visitors with joyful barking
now support for line breaks and ensuring optimal happiness levels in the facility.

experience.title: Chief Cuddle Officer
experience.description: Providing essential cuddling services to customers to enhance their emotional well-being and reduce stress levels.

certificates.title: Certified Stuffed Animal
certificates.description: Graduated with honors from the Good Doggo School and specialized in imitating a stuffed animal.

certificates.title: Professional Bark Master
certificates.description: Certified in advanced barking techniques and silent surveillance to ensure property security without noise.

certificates.title: Expert in Fetching
certificates.description: Recognized for outstanding skills in fetching and never missing a ball or frisbee.
